participant_1.background:
My hair is a vibrant shade of purple, which is perfect for my personality and my sense of style.
I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time.
My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours.
i do not drink alcohol.
I'm working on my car in the garage, and dreaming of Australia.

participant_2.background:
I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
I love discovering new things about myself!
i have shot a lion.
i like to draw.

content.text: Hey how is your day going?
Good, thanks for asking! I like your hair.
Thanks! It's a vibrant shade of purple, which is perfect for my personality and my sense of style.
I'm not much for bright colors, but I love that it's something that makes you happy.
Thanks, I'm glad you like it. What do you do for fun?
I'm not really a morning person, so I like to relax and enjoy some peace and quiet on the weekends. I also like to draw and explore new things about myself.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time. I'm a safari guide, so I get to explore new things all the time. I also love to read in my spare time.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go on safari. I'm sure you have some great stories to tell.
I do! I've seen some amazing animals and had some really close calls.
That sounds like an incredible experience. I'm so jealous.
It was! I'm glad I could share it with you.
